Text.Page:
[Call of the Shariar]

Report to {@LinkCreature:78#3002#Kalkzak} at {@Rgn:78001$$Zulfikar Fortress}.

The Shariar would like to work with you on missions of mutual interest.

I'm the Shariar speaker for {@Rgn:78001$$Zulfikar Fortress}.

Your fierce reputation put you at the top of the list of soldiers we want to work with.

With your aid, we believe the Shariar can vanquish the argons and take back our world from those monsters. What do you say?
